abstract: JPMorgan Chase has hired Paul Brown, a senior insurance deal-maker, from Bank of America Merrill Lynch, the firm announced in an internal memo.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has hired Paul Brown, a senior insurance deal-maker, from Bank of America Merrill Lynch, the firm announced in an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Paul Brown, a senior insurance deal-maker, from Bank of America Merrill Lynch, the firm announced in an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook on Monday.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Senior Insurance Banker From Bank of America

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
